thread.title: Man shot dead on street in Trenton neighborhood
thread.title_full: Man shot dead on street in Trenton neighborhood

author: Kevin Shea | For NJ.com
title: Man shot dead on street in Trenton neighborhood
text:
comments 
TRENTON -- A man was shot dead on Hudson Street in the city's Chambersburg neighborhood Wednesday afternoon, Trenton police said. 
Police spokesman Lt. Stephen Varn said several people dialed 911 at about 3:45 p.m. and reported a shooting at Hamilton Avenue and Hudson Street. 
Officers arrived and found a man struck by gunfire in the middle of the 100 block of Hudson Street, Varn said. 
Emergency medical officials pronounced the man dead in the street. At 4:30 p.m., the man's body was at the scene, covered by a sheet. 
Trenton police and the Mercer County Homicide Task Force are investigating. 
No other details of the incident were immediately available from police.
